title: Classic 3D Shooters *MEGA PACK*
description:
UPDATED - FINAL RELEASE

This package contains all of the old school DOS first-person shooters with new updated launchers specifically for Windows for better graphics and 3D Sound.

* Heretic: Shadow of the Serpent Riders
* Hexen: Beyond Heretic
* Hexen: Deathkings of the Dark Citadel
* Strife: Quest for the Sigil
* DOOM Registered
* The Ultimate DOOM
* DOOM 2: Hell on Earth
* Final Doom: Plutonia Experiment
* Final Doom: TNT - Evilution

** Duke Nukem 3D Atomic Edition
** Duke Nukem 3D: Duke it out in D.C.
** Duke Nukem 3D: Caribbean - Life's a Beach
** Duke Nukem 3D: Nuclear Winter
** Shadow Warrior

Wolfenstein 3D
Spear of Destiny
Spear of Destiny Mission 2: Return to Danger
Spear of Destiny Mission 3: Ultimate Challenge
Rise of the Triad

* Use "Skulltag" to play online! (included in archive).

** Use "YANG" to play online! (included in archive).

Every .WAD, .GRP, and so fourth are full registered versions of the latest available release.

I put this package together myself and seems to be the best and most complete one of its kind.
